data.actual_result: They don't use the full space of the category bar. Also it is scrollable now even though there is nothing to scroll.
data.expected_result: There should be more padding between them to use the full width of the category bar.
data.short_description: [iPad only] Wrong/missing padding between emoji categories in the emote picker
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text chat - Click on the emote picker symbol - Observe the padding/spacing between the emoji categories
